headline: Fortive Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend on its Common Stock
summary: EVERETT, Wash., August 27, 2025--Fortive Corporation ("Fortive") (NYSE: FTV) announced today that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.06 per share on its common stock, par value $0.01 per share, payable on September 26, 2025 to common stockholders of record on September 12, 2025. Although Fortive expects to pay dividends on a quarterly basis, any subsequent declaration of dividends, including the amount, the record dates and the payment dates for any such futu

headline: Fortive to Present at Morgan Stanley 13th Annual Laguna Conference
summary: EVERETT, Wash., August 27, 2025--Fortive Corporation ("Fortive") (NYSE: FTV) today announced that Olumide Soroye, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Mark Okerstrom, Chief Financial Officer, will be presenting at the Morgan Stanley 13th Annual Laguna Conference on Wednesday, September 10th, 2025 at 1:05 p.m. PT (4:05 p.m. ET). The audio will be simultaneously webcast and will be archived on www.fortive.com.
